name: Robo-Bomb Factory
description:
This is my newest platforming game where you take control of the latest in bomb collecting robotics. You're tasked with collecting as many bombs as you can until you take on too much damage.

Controls are:

WSAD or Left Controller Stick for movement

Start Button or Escape key to Pause

I really hope everyone who plays enjoys themselves playing this game! It didn't take me too long to make but I learned so much from this project! And I'm very satisfied with what I came up with!

Please leave a comment on what you think and if you'd like to give any critique I'd greatly appreciate it!

Also please read my postmortem about every thing that I learned about in the process of making this game. This project taught me a lot about myself and how to be better at reaching my goals. It would really mean a lot to me!

Thank you all for playing!

Credits go to 

marching dream For music

NullSave For Controller and Keyboard Icons
